metadata.name: Heart
metadata.description:
The heart plays a major role in our body. In most cultures it's also the figurative center of our feelings, emotions and dreams.  
The physical heart pumps blood through our veins, the same way the figurative heart pumps love, joy, hope and hatred through our souls, keeping us alive.  
The heart is the mean to many ends, and the end of it all. Both in the abstract and concrete narratives, holding within our most sincere desires.  
And in the end, the fastest way to a man's heart is unbeknownst to all, but himself.

*

"Heart"  
Photography by Victor Ribeiro  
3010 × 3956  
Rio de Janeiro, 2023
